name: MIS Shannon Trust Learner Admissions
description:
Shannon Trust Learner Admissions - The report prompts for the prisoner movement IN dates over a date range. It lists all the prisoners who had an IN movement and have a Shannon Trust education entry in NOMIS. From this report prisoners can be managed and 'Picked up on Transfer'
SHT0003 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 15/11/13

dataset.name: Prisoner Education Transfers
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_EDUCATION_START_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_EDUCATION_END_DATE.DAY_DATE AS EDUCATION_END_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_TYPE, AT_EDUCATION_STUDY_AREA.CODE, AT_EDUCATION_STUDY_AREA.DESCRIPTION, AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL.CODE AS EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE, AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL.DESCRIPTION AS EDUCATION_LEVEL_DESC, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_SCHEDULE, AT_EDUCATION_SCHEDULE.DESCRIPTION AS EDUCATION_SCHEDULE_DESC, AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE AS MOVEMENT_DATE_ONLY_, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK AS MOVEMENT_LOCATION_TO_CODE_, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_EDUCATION_START_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_EDUCATION_END_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_EDUCATION_STUDY_AREA, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_EDUCATION_SCHEDULE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO, BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL AT_FACT_MOV_EXT, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.START_DATE_SK = AT_EDUCATION_START_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.END_DATE_SK = AT_EDUCATION_END_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.STUDY_AREA_SK = AT_EDUCATION_STUDY_AREA.REFERENCE_CODE_SK) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_LEVEL_SK = AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL.REFERENCE_CODE_SK) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_SCHEDULE = AT_EDUCATION_SCHEDULE.CODE) AND (AT_EDUCATION_SCHEDULE.CODE_DOMAIN = 'EDU_SCHED') AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DATE_SK) AND (CASE WHEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.FROM_LOCATION_TYPE = 'Establishment' THEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.FROM_LOCATION_SK END = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+)) AND (CASE WHEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TO_LOCATION_TYPE = 'Establishment' THEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TO_LOCATION_SK END = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+)) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_SCHEDULE = 'STL' AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)) AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DIRECTION_CODE = 'IN' AND AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Movement In - From Date:','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Movement In - To Date:','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT AREA_DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, DAY_DATE, EDUCATION_END_DATE, EDUCATION_TYPE, CODE, DESCRIPTION, EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE, EDUCATION_LEVEL_DESC, EDUCATION_SCHEDULE, EDUCATION_SCHEDULE_DESC, MOVEMENT_DATE_ONLY_, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, MOVEMENT_LOCATION_TO_CODE_, TYPE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Picked up Transfers
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_EDUCATION_START_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_EDUCATION_END_DATE.DAY_DATE AS EDUCATION_END_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_TYPE, AT_EDUCATION_STUDY_AREA.CODE, AT_EDUCATION_STUDY_AREA.DESCRIPTION, AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL.CODE AS EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE, AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL.DESCRIPTION AS EDUCATION_LEVEL_DESC, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_SCHEDULE, AT_EDUCATION_SCHEDULE.DESCRIPTION AS EDUCATION_SCHEDULE_DESC, AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE AS MOVEMENT_DATE_ONLY_, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK AS MOVEMENT_LOCATION_TO_CODE_, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_EDUCATION_START_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_EDUCATION_END_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_EDUCATION_STUDY_AREA, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_EDUCATION_SCHEDULE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO, BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL AT_FACT_MOV_EXT, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.START_DATE_SK = AT_EDUCATION_START_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.END_DATE_SK = AT_EDUCATION_END_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.STUDY_AREA_SK = AT_EDUCATION_STUDY_AREA.REFERENCE_CODE_SK) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_LEVEL_SK = AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL.REFERENCE_CODE_SK) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_SCHEDULE = AT_EDUCATION_SCHEDULE.CODE) AND (AT_EDUCATION_SCHEDULE.CODE_DOMAIN = 'EDU_SCHED') AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DATE_SK) AND (CASE WHEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.FROM_LOCATION_TYPE = 'Establishment' THEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.FROM_LOCATION_SK END = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+)) AND (CASE WHEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TO_LOCATION_TYPE = 'Establishment' THEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TO_LOCATION_SK END = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+)) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_SCHEDULE = 'STL' AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)) AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DIRECTION_CODE = 'IN' AND AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Movement In - From Date:','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Movement In - To Date:','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */) AND AT_EDUCATION_LEVEL.DESCRIPTION = 'Picked up on transfer')), dataset_ AS (SELECT AREA_DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, DAY_DATE, EDUCATION_END_DATE, EDUCATION_TYPE, CODE, DESCRIPTION, EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE, EDUCATION_LEVEL_DESC, EDUCATION_SCHEDULE, EDUCATION_SCHEDULE_DESC, MOVEMENT_DATE_ONLY_, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, MOVEMENT_LOCATION_TO_CODE_, TYPE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE PRISONER_EDUCATION_TRANSFERS49 = '31/12/9000 00:00:00')
